content: this is a crochet pattern for a mushroom guy the pattern is written in english with us terminology the pattern doesn t use any advanced techniques so it is suitable for a beginner crocheter materials 2/sport/fine weight yarn in colors dark red beige peach and black 2 5mm crochet hook stuffing of your choice tapestry needle x2 7mm safety eyes scissors pins the finished toy measures approximately 15 cm 6 if you want a bigger toy you can change the yarn weight and hook size accordingly you may not replicate and sell this pattern however you may sell toys made with this pattern but credit or tag @neatlystitched in the pictures
